memory[0] = 32'b0000000_00011_00100_000_0100_0_1100011; // beq x4, x3, 4
memory[1] = 32'b0000000_00010_00001_001_0010_0_1100011; // bne x1, x2, 4
memory[2] = 32'b0000000_00101_00110_100_0110_0_1100011; // blt x6, x5, 12
memory[3] = 32'b0000000_00110_00101_101_1000_0_1100011; // bge x5, x6, 16
memory[4] = 32'b0000000_01000_01001_000_1010_0_1100011; // beq x9, x8, 20
memory[5] = 32'b0000000_00001_01010_001_1100_0_1100011; // bne x10, x1, 24
memory[6] = 32'b0000000_01100_01101_100_1110_0_1100011; // blt x13, x12, 28
memory[7] = 32'b0000000_01101_01100_101_0000_1_1100011; // bge x12, x13, 32
